scripts.clean-old-builds: rm -rf client/build build public && echo 'ðŸ§¹ Cleaned old builds'
scripts.build-client: cd client && node scripts/inject-build-meta.js && REACT_APP_BUILD_TIMESTAMP=$(date +%s) GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false npm run build
scripts.build-client-dev: cd client && node scripts/inject-build-meta.js && export REACT_APP_BUILD_TIMESTAMP=$(date +%s) && export GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=true && npm run build && cd .. && ./scripts/prerender-canonicals.sh && echo 'âœ… Dev build and pre-rendering complete'
scripts.deploy-build: echo 'ðŸšš Deploying build to root directory...' && cp -r client/dist/* . && echo 'âœ… Build deployed to root directory'
scripts.build: npm run install-client && npm run build-client && npm run deploy-build && npm run prerender-canonicals && npm run generate-sitemap
